title: Artportable Exhibitions and showroom
exhibitionText: Every week a new artist exhibits at Artportable. We do not exclude any artistic expressions, there is something for all tastes and budgets. Painting, sculpture, photo or craft - discover art all year round at Artportable's physical gallery in Södermalm, Stockholm. Artportable's brilliant artists also adorn the walls of Stockholm Fisk, Art bakery NK, Ångbåtsbryggan, PS Matsal, LA Piazza and Art Café - NK
welcomeText: Welcome to visit Artportable at Åsögatan 176!
